benchmark_details.name: MV-MATH (Evaluating Multimodal Math Reasoning in Multi-Visual Contexts)
benchmark_details.overview: MV-MATH is a meticulously curated dataset of 2,009 high-quality mathematical problems integrating multiple images with text, aimed at evaluating multimodal large language models' mathematical reasoning in multi-visual contexts derived from authentic K-12 scenarios.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a comprehensive and rigorous benchmark for assessing MLLMsâ€™ mathematical reasoning in multi-visual contexts.

data.source: Curated from authentic K-12 mathematics scenarios with annotations.

methodology.calculation: Metrics calculated based on the model's performance on MV-MATH dataset against ground truth answers.
methodology.interpretation: Accuracies indicate model effectiveness in multi-visual mathematical reasoning tasks.
methodology.validation: Cross-validation by multiple annotators to ensure quality.
